text:
Containership | Software Engineers | Full-time, Onsite | https://jobs.containership.io/

Containership is a cloud agnostic container management solution built on top of leading standard technologies like Kubernetes. We have multiple teams hiring: the open-source team, the cloud dashboard team, and the R&D team. Check out the job postings for more information.

You can submit your resume at the link listed above or contact me at nick@containership.io if you have any other questions.
